text: Kandi nta buvugizi buzagira icyo bumara kuri we (Allah), usibye gusa uwo yahaye uburenganzira. (Iyo Allah avuze, abamalayika barakangarana bakagwa igihumure) kugeza ubwo imitima yabo ishiriye ubwoba, (bamwe) bakavuga bati "Nyagasani wanyu yavuze iki?" (Abandi) bati "(Yavuze) ukuri; kandi ni Uwikirenga, Usumba byose
